review_title: Treated like trash, and discarded as such
job_title: Shift Supervisor in Chapel Hill, NC
pros: The people I worked with were great
cons: Corporate is full of virtue signaling, half-truths, and outright lies. They try to give the impression to the general public that they care about their employees but its all a facade. Expect to work long hours for terrible wages, in a stressful condition dealing with the worst of the general public. Add COVID 19 on top, and you're better off going hungry than working at Starbucks. I had put in almost 10 years of work with no marks on my record, and when I made one mistake it cost me my job. This incident was never considered in the light of my work with Starbucks and the way I had conducted myself on the job. They don't care. You're nothing but an employee number at Starbucks.
